allow:
Bash(# ドキュメントのバックアップを作成
cp /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/docs/spreadsheet-functions-reference.md /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/docs/spreadsheet-functions-reference.md.bak

# 13. 互換性関数セクションを削除（614行目から658行目まで）
sed -i '' '614,658d' /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/docs/spreadsheet-functions-reference.md

# 14を13に、15を14に変更
sed -i '' 's/## 14\. Google Sheets専用関数/## 13. Google Sheets専用関数/g' /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/docs/spreadsheet-functions-reference.md
sed -i '' 's/## 15\. 新しい関数・その他/## 14. 新しい関数・その他/g' /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/docs/spreadsheet-functions-reference.md)

Bash(# 統計関数セクションの最後にレガシー関数を追加
grep -n "^## 03\. 文字列操作関数" /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/docs/spreadsheet-functions-reference.md)

Bash(# 13-compatibilityディレクトリを削除
rm -rf /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/src/utils/functions/13-compatibility

# ディレクトリ名を変更（14→13、15→14）
mv /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/src/utils/functions/14-google-sheets /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/src/utils/functions/13-google-sheets
mv /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/src/utils/functions/15-others /Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/src/utils/functions/14-others)

Bash(# Save logic functions
rg -o "export const (\w+):\s*CustomFormula" -r '$1' src/utils/spreadsheet/logic --no-filename | sort | uniq > /tmp/logic_functions.txt

# Save definition functions
for file in src/utils/spreadsheet/definitions/*.ts; do rg "^\s*(\w+):\s*\{" "$file" -o -r '$1' | grep -v "^$"; done | sort | uniq > /tmp/definition_functions.txt

# Find functions in logic but not in definitions
comm -23 /tmp/logic_functions.txt /tmp/definition_functions.txt)

Bash(# Create a list of missing functions
comm -23 /tmp/logic_functions.txt /tmp/definition_functions.txt > /tmp/missing_functions.txt

# For each missing function, find which logic file it's in
echo "=== Missing Functions by Category ==="
for func in $(cat /tmp/missing_functions.txt); do
    file=$(rg -l "export const $func:\s*CustomFormula" src/utils/spreadsheet/logic)
    echo "$func:$file"
done | sort -t: -k2 | awk -F: '{
    if ($2 != prev) {
        if (prev != "") print ""
        print "\n" $2 ":"
        prev = $2
    }
    print "  - " $1
}' | sed 's|/Users/yuki/created-system/spreed-sheet-react-sample/src/utils/spreadsheet/logic/||g')

Bash(# Create a list of missing functions
comm -23 /tmp/logic_functions.txt /tmp/definition_functions.txt > /tmp/missing_functions.txt

# For each missing function, find which logic file it's in
echo "=== Missing Functions by Category ==="
for func in $(cat /tmp/missing_functions.txt); do
    file=$(rg -l "export const $func:\s*CustomFormula" src/utils/spreadsheet/logic | head -1)
    echo "$func:$file"
done | sort -t: -k2 | awk -F: 'BEGIN {prev=""} {
    if ($2 != prev) {
        if (prev != "") print ""
        gsub(/.*\/logic\//, "", $2)
        print "\n" $2 ":"
        prev = $2
    }
    print "  - " $1
}')
